experience.title: Experience
experience.description: With a proven track record of success in software development and team collaboration, I bring a wealth of experience to every project. My background includes working on diverse technologies, implementing efficient solutions, and driving innovation in fast-paced environments. From conceptualizing ideas to delivering robust systems, I consistently strive to exceed expectations and contribute to meaningful outcomes.

bio.title: bio
bio.description:
About me
As a software developer, I am driven by a deep curiosity and passion for exploring the ever‐evolving world of IT. Eager to learn and grow, I continually seek out new technologies, tools, and methodologies to sharpen my skills and stay ahead of the curve. Working alongside motivated and talented individuals not only inspires me but also provides invaluable opportunities to learn from diverse perspectives and collaborate on challenging projects.

interests.title: interests
interests.description: I have a strong interest in exploring the intersection of web development and innovative strategies. I enjoy collaborating with teams that embrace agile methodologies to deliver impactful solutions swiftly and effectively. Outside of work, I stay updated on emerging technologies and actively contribute to open-source communities.

education.title: education
education.description: I earned a degree in Computer Science with a strong focus on mathematics and programming. My background has equipped me with strong skills in algorithms, software development, and problem-solving. I stay current with technological advancements and apply my education to contribute effectively to innovative projects and collaborative teams.

files.university: Higher Institute of Informatics and Mathematics of Monastir

favorite-games.title: favorite-games
favorite-games.description: In my free time, I enjoy playing Valorant, a tactical first-person shooter that sharpens my strategic thinking and teamwork skills. It’s a great way to unwind while staying mentally engaged. Balancing gaming with my professional life helps me recharge and maintain a healthy work-life balance.

1.title: Aermax
1.description: The Aermax project, for an industrial climbers company located in Germany, is an extensive endeavor focused on creating a robust and scalable platform by integrating both existing and newly developed microservices.

2.title: react-crafitify
2.description: React-Crafitify is a versatile React component library designed to enhance the user interface of your web applications. With a focus on aesthetics and usability, React-Crafitify provides a collection of customizable UI components that can seamlessly integrate into your projects..

3.title: Incedo Lead Generator
3.description: I contributed to the project The Incedo Lead Generator, an innovative platform that enables precise targeting of your clearly defined target group. Whether in recruiting to find the right candidates or in sales to generate promising leads, through intelligent automation,

4.title: Prosemaster
4.description: Prosemaster is an AI-driven platform that helps you perfect your grammar, rephrase sentences, summarize texts, and create captivating articles effortlessly. It enhances your writing and communication skills, making it an essential tool for content creators, students, professionals, and anyone seeking to improve their written communication.

5.title: hashnode backend
5.description: I reverse-engineered Hashnode and developed the backend using Node.js and Express.js, incorporating Redis for efficient data caching and management.
